description: Connect to and query a SQL Server database and convert the result to a datatable; SELECT statements only.

input.name: hostname
input.description: The name of the database host. Defaults to "localhost".

input.name: port
input.description: The port the database is exposed on. Defaults to 1433.

input.name: query
input.description: The query to be passed to the database.

output.name: data
output.description: An object containing columns and rows.
